Class ClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object

      • communication.ClientHandler

    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientHandler
extends Communication
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Multiple client handler object for server. Creates a new client object for each connection request.

    mdi
